data.description: Solventum Corp. operates as a health care company. The company is headquartered in St. Paul, Minnesota and currently employs 22,000 full-time employees. The company went IPO on 2024-03-26. The firm's segments include MedSurg, Dental Solutions, Health Information Systems, and Purification and Filtration. MedSurg segment provides solutions including negative pressure wound therapy, advanced wound dressings, advanced skin care, and others. Dental Solutions segment provides a suite of dental and orthodontic products including brackets, aligners, restorative cements, and bonding agents. Health Information Systems segment provides healthcare systems with software solutions, including computer-assisted physician documentation, direct-to-bill and coding automation, and data visualization platforms. Purification and Filtration segment provides purification and filtration technologies including filters, purifiers, cartridges, and membranes.
data.name: Solventum Corp
